name: Transventures
description:
NOTE: This game is still heavily in development. Stuff may be janky and bugs/crashes may be common.

Story

Hi there! My name is Trantran and I love going on adventures! This game showcases one of my greatest adventures yet to find the legendary gender mage. Legend says that they can change one's gender instantly. So, being the dysphoric little ball I am, I had to meet them!

Features
  • Smooth controls!
  • Cute sound design!
  • A plethora of different obstacles and objects to interact with!
  • A helpful hand in the form of the window title!
  • An active, friendly and above all nonbinary developer working on the game!
FAQ

Why is Trantran a ball? Why not a cat or something else?
I believe that having a simple and recognizable character is important, so I decided that our protagonist will be an optimistic yet slightly dysphoric trans ball.

ArE yA cOdInG, sOn?
Yes. I'm coding as much as I can.

Roadmap?
Yes.

What's UPP?
UPP was Transventures' s old name. It stood for "Unique Puzzle Platformer" and had way more generic sprites.
